	• They assure her of their love and support, emphasizing their desire to help her through this.
• Donna suggests recreating family memories to help Beth.
	• They plan to make a list of ways to bring back Beth's memories.
• Marcus reveals his connection to Donna to Rick, Steffy, and some coworkers.
	• While some are surprised, Marcus assures them he's staying grounded.
• Steffy believes Marcus will shake things up at Forrester.
	• She finds his authenticity and determination refreshing.
• Owen Knight, the investigator, approaches Marcus, reminding him of his debt.
	• This hints at a potential conflict or leverage Owen might have over Marcus. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Brooke and Nick are stuck on Nick's boat in the fog.
    • Brooke calls Rick to let him know she won't be home.
    • Nick cooks dinner for Brooke.
    • They talk about their lives and what they want in the future.
    • Nick says he wants to have five daughters.
• Deacon proposes to Macy.
    • Macy is hesitant because she's just gotten out of a marriage.
    • Deacon assures her that he loves her and wants to spend the rest of his life with her.
    • He believes they've earned their happiness.
    • Macy is still unsure.
• Rick confronts Sally about Macy's relationship with Deacon.
    • Rick believes Deacon is using Macy to get back at the Forresters.
    • Sally disagrees and says Deacon is making Macy happy.
    • Rick warns Sally that Macy will get hurt.
    • Sally says Macy is making her own decisions and she supports her.
</summary>

<summary>
• **Brooke's Decision:**
    • Brooke decides to step down as the spokesmodel for her lingerie line, "Brooke's Bedroom," and offers the position to her sister, Donna.
    • She makes this decision partly due to her love for Nick and their marriage, which requires compromise.

• **Donna's Opportunity:**
    • Donna is hesitant to accept the offer, feeling inadequate and acknowledging that the brand is built on Brooke's image.
    • However, Brooke encourages her, believing in her potential and trusting her to carry on the legacy.

• **Ridge's Reaction:**
    • Ridge is unhappy with Brooke's decision, feeling that the line is nothing without her.
    • He initially decides to stop designing for "Brooke's Bedroom" as a result.

• **Dante and Bridget's Struggle:**
    • Dante is disappointed when Bridget's pregnancy test is negative, revealing his strong desire to start a family.
    • Bridget's hesitation and changing feelings about having children immediately create conflict in their relationship.

• **Felicia's Interference:**
    • Felicia, Dante's ex and mother of his son, uses the situation to try and win him back.
    • She reminds Dante of their past happiness and plants seeds of doubt about his future with Bridget.

• **Donna and Ridge's Connection:**
    • Donna confesses to Ridge the profound impact he and Brooke's love story has had on her life.
    • Her heartfelt words and willingness to support him eventually convince Ridge to continue designing for the lingerie line.
</summary>

<summary>
• Eric and Stephanie have to make a difficult decision about whether Thorne or Ridge should run Forrester.
	• Thorne issued an ultimatum that either he or Ridge leaves the company.
	• Stephanie regrets treating Ridge differently than her other children.
	• Eric wants Thorne and Ridge to apologize to each other.
• Ridge designs some new clothes and shows them to Brooke.
	• Ridge is confident that he will be chosen to run Forrester.
	• Brooke thinks Ridge is acting like Massimo.
	• Ridge thinks Thorne is insecure.
• Darla is worried that she is the reason Thorne might lose his job.
	• Darla went to see Eric and Stephanie to plead Thorne's case.
	• Brooke also went to see Eric and Stephanie to lobby for Ridge.
	• Darla thinks Thorne deserves to run Forrester.
• Felicia thinks Thorne will be the one to leave Forrester.
	• Felicia doesn't think Stephanie can be impartial.
	• Ridge asks Felicia to talk to Thomas about the girl he is seeing.
	• Felicia advises Thomas to be nice to his father.
• Eric announces his decision.
	• Eric thinks both Ridge and Thorne are in the wrong.
	• Ridge and Thorne argue in front of Eric and Stephanie.
	• Eric decides that Ridge will be the one to leave Forrester.
</summary>

<summary>
• Thorne left Donna at the altar after Katie told him that Donna doesn't really love him.
    • Katie confronted Donna about her true feelings for Thorne before the wedding.
    • Donna admitted to Katie that she is marrying Thorne to get revenge on Stephanie.
    • Katie told Thorne the truth, and he left Donna heartbroken at the altar.
• Donna is furious with both Katie and Stephanie.
    • Donna feels betrayed by Katie for revealing her secret.
    • She blames Stephanie for turning Thorne against her.
    • Donna vows to get revenge on both of them.
• Stephanie is thrilled that the wedding didn't happen.
    • She believes that Thorne finally sees Donna for who she really is.
    • Stephanie orders Donna to leave the Forrester property and never come back.
• Taylor is relieved that Thorne didn't go through with the wedding.
    • She believes that Thorne deserves to be with someone who truly loves him.
    • Taylor is concerned about Thorne's well-being after the disastrous wedding.
• Nick is supportive of Taylor's decision to check on Thorne.
    • He understands her concern for Thorne's well-being.
    • Nick is aware of the complicated history between Thorne, Donna, and Stephanie.
• Eric is informed about the wedding's disastrous outcome.
    • Jackie tells him that Thorne couldn't go through with the marriage.
    • Eric's reaction to the news is not explicitly mentioned.
• The guests at the wedding are shocked and confused by Thorne's sudden departure.
    • They witness the emotional fallout from the failed wedding.
    • The guests are left to speculate about the reasons behind Thorne's decision.
• Katie feels guilty for hurting Donna but believes she did the right thing.
    • She acknowledges that her actions caused pain to her sister.
    • Katie justifies her decision by saying that Thorne deserved to know the truth.
</summary>

<summary>
• Eric has awakened from his coma and is recovering at home with his family.
     • He saw Donna in bed with Owen and is very upset.
• Stephanie is trying to keep Donna away from Eric.
     • She claims that Eric wants to be with her and that the marriage is over. 
</summary>

<summary>
• **Hope and Deacon reunite:**
    • Deacon visits Hope after her break-up with Liam and apologizes for leaving abruptly on her wedding day. Hope shares the details of her failed marriage, revealing Liam's ongoing feelings for Steffy and Bill's disapproval of her.

• **Bill encourages Liam to move on:**
    • Bill celebrates Liam's newfound assertiveness and encourages him to forget about Hope, believing their relationship is over for good. He sees Liam's embrace of his Spencer heritage as a positive development.

• **Thomas and Hope's photo shoot stirs controversy:**
    • Rick orchestrates a provocative photo shoot with Thomas and Hope for the Hope for the Future line, aiming to generate publicity. This raises concerns for Caroline, who questions Thomas's intentions, and Katie, who sees through Bill's attempt to use it as proof of Hope moving on.

• **Deacon blames himself for Hope's failed marriage:**
    • Deacon reveals that he didn't intend to leave the letter that caused Liam to doubt Hope's commitment. He believes his actions inadvertently contributed to the breakdown of their relationship.

• **Hope still loves Liam:**
    • Despite putting on a brave face, Hope confesses to Deacon that she still loves Liam. She is heartbroken by the situation and struggles to move on.
</summary>

<summary>
• Thorne's parents, Eric and Stephanie, apologize for not showing him enough support and give him a collection called "Spectra Couture by Thorne Forrester."
    • They acknowledge that he has always deserved their respect and are proud of his accomplishments.
    • Eric offers Thorne his old job back at Forrester, but Thorne is hesitant because of Ridge.
    • Darla encourages Thorne, believing that things can change at Forrester now that his parents recognize his talent.
    • Thorne believes the only way things would work at Forrester is if Ridge were no longer there.
• Ridge leaves town for work, assuring Brooke that he won't be gone long and that their love will keep them connected.
    • Brooke is anxious about Ridge leaving and worries about managing the family without him.
    • She expresses her reluctance to ask Stephanie for help, fearing interference.
    • Ridge reassures Brooke, reminding her of the restraining order against Amber and that they can always rely on each other.
• Thomas continues to see Amber despite the restraining order, meeting her during her breaks at Insomnia.
    • Caitlin informs Stephanie about their encounters, concerned about the situation but not wanting to get Amber in trouble.
    • Stephanie assures Caitlin that she will handle the situation.
    • Caitlin feels partially responsible for their relationship, believing Thomas's loneliness and the absence of his biological mother contribute to his choices.
• Stephanie confronts Amber at Insomnia after seeing Thomas leave.
    • Amber tries to deny their meeting, but Stephanie doesn't believe her.
    • Stephanie reminds Amber of the warnings she and Ridge gave her.
    • The confrontation suggests that Stephanie will take action to protect Thomas and enforce the restraining order. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Bill tries to convince Liam to call off his engagement with Hope, believing she doesn't appreciate him.
    * Bill thinks Hope prioritizes her career over Liam.
    * He throws Liam a bachelor party and invites Steffy to drive Liam home.
    * Bill wants Steffy to end Liam and Hope's engagement.
    * Justin is proud of Bill for seemingly accepting Hope but is shocked to learn about Bill's plan.
* Hope prepares for a romantic night with Liam, unaware of his feelings.
    * She is excited to spend the night with him and believes their wedding is a formality.
    * Brooke is concerned about Hope's decision to postpone telling Liam about the wedding date.
    * Ridge believes Liam will understand Hope's reasons.
* Steffy drives Liam home, fueling his doubts about Hope.
    * Liam is upset that Hope chose work over moving up their wedding date.
    * Steffy offers support and suggests Hope is self-absorbed.
    * Liam defends Hope but is unsure how to address the situation.
    * Steffy offers to spend the night with Liam, but he declines.
</summary>

<summary>
* Bridget is pregnant with Nick's child.
    * Bridget is worried about how her mother, Brooke, will react to the news.
    * Nick assures Bridget that they will find a way to make it work.
    * Nick believes that Brooke will understand their situation.
    * Bridget is worried that this will ruin Nick and Brooke's marriage.
* Shane is blackmailing Taylor, Phoebe, and Hector.
    * Shane witnessed Darla's death and knows that Taylor was involved.
    * He is pretending to be a gardener for the family.
    * Stephanie wants to pay Shane off to keep quiet.
    * Hector wants to physically harm Shane.
* Brooke does not want to have more children.
    * Jackie, Nick's mother, is disappointed that they are not having children.
    * Brooke believes that raising Hope is enough for Nick.
    * Nick seems to be okay with not having children, but his conversation with Brooke at the end suggests otherwise.
    * It is implied that Nick might want to raise Bridget's baby as his own. 
</summary>

<summary>
• **Flo donates a kidney to Katie:**
    • Flo secretly donated her kidney to Katie.
    • The Logans are shocked and conflicted about Flo's actions.
    • Katie is grateful to Flo for saving her life.
    • Flo claims she did it for her father, Storm, and to make amends for her past actions.

• **Brooke remains unforgiving:**
    • Brooke refuses to forgive Flo for her role in the baby swap.
    • She believes Flo's actions were an attempt to worm her way back into the family.
    • Brooke warns Shauna to stay away from her, her sisters, and Ridge.

• **Hope is also hesitant to forgive:**
    • Hope agrees with Brooke that Flo's actions don't erase the pain she caused.
    • She remains hurt and angry about being kept from her daughter.

• **Donna expresses gratitude but understands the situation:**
    • Donna acknowledges the magnitude of Flo's gesture.
    • She is thankful that Katie is alive but understands her sisters' anger.

• **Wyatt and Sally navigate their relationship:**
    • Sally worries about Flo's lingering feelings for Wyatt.
    • Wyatt assures Sally that he is committed to her and wants to get married.
    • They discuss Flo's actions and the impact on their relationship.

• **Douglas demonstrates maturity and resilience:**
    • Douglas helps take care of baby Beth while Hope is at the hospital.
    • He shows understanding and support for the situation.
    • Douglas's actions highlight his growth and strength.
</summary>

<summary>
• Quinn is upset because she found her son, Wyatt, in bed with Katie.
    • She confronted Katie and physically removed her from the bed.
    • Quinn's husband, Eric, is angry with her for her actions.
    • Quinn is scared because Eric has never been so angry with her.
• Katie told Eric about Quinn's attack.
    • Katie believes Quinn is unstable and dangerous.

<summary>

* Marital Discord:
    * Sami and E.J. argue over E.J. representing Nicole in her divorce. Sami accuses E.J. of being attracted to Nicole and uses their son as leverage to force E.J. to drop Nicole as a client.
* Family Concerns:
    * Kate worries about Chelsea's health and tries to contact Billie and Bo. Nick cancels class to be with Chelsea.
* Medical Mystery:
    * Daniel orders tests for Chelsea but avoids revealing his suspicions about her condition to Kate and Nick.  He distracts Chelsea with stories of Australia.
* Mental Instability:
    * Ava's mental state deteriorates as she relives her wedding day with Steve and expresses her hatred for Kayla. She demands Kayla's baby as compensation for her ruined life.
* Fatherly Blackmail:
    * E.J. accuses Sami of using their children as leverage in their argument. Sami threatens to reveal damaging information to the immigration officer.
* Professional Conflict:
    * E.J. defends his decision to represent Nicole, citing his need for income. Sami argues that Nicole is dangerous and manipulative.
* Romantic Jealousy:
    * E.J. suggests Sami is jealous of Nicole, which Sami vehemently denies.  E.J. points out Sami's reaction to Nicole's attire at Chez Rouge.
* Implied Threat:
    * Philip warns someone that their association with John is damaging their father's career and reputation.
</summary>

* Rex confides in Mimi about his academic achievements and his desire to understand his true identity.
    * He expresses his fear of becoming too intelligent and losing other aspects of his personality.
* The episode ends with a cliffhanger, leaving the audience wondering about Ramsell's next move and the fate of those involved.
    * Roman assures everyone that they are doing everything they can to apprehend Ramsell.

<summary>

<summary>

<summary>

    • The DVD contains a message from Franco, revealing his troubled past.

• **Jax's Deception and Jane's Concerns:**
    • Jax lies to Michael, claiming to have intervened

<summary>
• **The Text Message Killer's Rampage:**
	• Diego Alcazar, the text message killer, holds Sam hostage and reveals his plan to kill Carly and frame Sonny for it.
	• He taunts Sam with the deaths he's caused, including Emily, Georgie, and Coop, and reveals he's dying from the bullet wound Sam inflicted.

<summary>
• **Olivia Jerome's Revenge:**
    • Olivia Jerome, Julian's presumed-dead sister, resurfaces and kidnaps Alexis to punish Julian for killing Duke.
    • She forces Julian to shoot Alexis, seeking to make him feel the pain she felt.
    • It is revealed that Olivia planted the bomb that killed Morgan, intending to target Julian.
    • Carly vows to make Olivia pay for Morgan's death.

• **Bomb Threat at General Hospital:**
    • A bomb threat forces the evacuation of General Hospital.
    • Jason and Curtis get trapped in an elevator with the bomb while trying to move it to the roof.
    • Curtis, with guidance from a bomb squad technician, successfully disarms the bomb.
    • Sam and Jason reunite after the explosion and are grateful to have survived.

• **Sonny and Carly's Struggle:**
    • Sonny confesses to Carly that he slept with Nelle, causing a rift between them.
    • Carly is furious with Sonny for his betrayal and for allowing Nelle to manipulate their family.
    • Sonny is devastated by Morgan's death and the fallout from his actions.
    • Despite the turmoil, Sonny finds solace in supporting Jason and Sam.

• **Finn's Addiction and Hayden's Support:**
    • Finn experiences withdrawal symptoms from his addiction to Zen-Zen while trapped in the hospital.
    • Hayden supports Finn through his withdrawal and vows to help him overcome his addiction.
    • Elizabeth discovers Finn's secret but agrees to keep it confidential if he takes a leave of absence.
    • Finn decides to face his addiction alone, despite Hayden's offer of support.
</summary>

<summary>
• Brandon is out on bail after being arrested for assaulting and attempting to rape Abby.
    • Abby is pressured by Brandon to drop the charges, fearing for Michael's safety.
    • Michael is enraged and wants to take matters into his own hands.
    • Dante tries to convince Abby to testify, worried about Michael's potential actions.
    • Abby ultimately refuses to testify, prioritizing Michael's freedom.
• Luke accidentally hit and killed Jake, Lucky's son.
    • Luke blames himself for the accident, admitting he had a few drinks.
    • Elizabeth also blames herself for not watching Jake closely enough.
    • Sonny tries to comfort Luke, emphasizing the accidental nature of the tragedy.
    • Jason is grieving and angry with Luke.
</summary>

<summary>
• **Jason and Sam grapple with the possibility of having a baby**
    • Jason is hesitant, still grieving the loss of his son Jake and fearing the dangers his lifestyle poses to a child.
    • Sam is unsure, torn between wanting to provide Jason solace and genuinely desiring a family.
    • Alexis, Sam's mother, advises her to carefully consider her motivations and make the decision that's right for her.

• **Jax uses Shawn's past to gain custody of Josslyn**
    • Jax digs up a sealed file detailing a violent incident from Shawn's past to portray him as unfit to protect Josslyn.
    • Carly fights back, arguing that Shawn is essential for Josslyn's safety, especially with Franco still posing a threat.
    • Despite the risks, Shawn agrees to stay on as Josslyn's bodyguard at Carly's request.

• **Kristina struggles with the aftermath of Lisa's manipulation**
    • Kristina reveals to Michael that Lisa got her hooked on hydrocodone under false pretenses.
    • Michael is furious with Lisa and concerned about Kristina's well-being, but Kristina downplays the situation.
    • Kristina asks Michael to keep her pill use a secret from their mother, Alexis, fearing her reaction and potential overcompensation.

• **Brenda and Sonny face challenges in their marriage after reuniting and discovering they have a son**
    • Brenda feels insecure and shut out due to Sonny's secretive nature, stemming from his desire to protect her from his dangerous lifestyle.
    • Sonny grapples with the responsibility of keeping Brenda and their son safe, questioning if he can truly provide a secure environment.
    • Brenda confides in Jax about her marital struggles, acknowledging the difficulties they face but remaining determined to make their relationship work.
</summary>

<summary>
* Nikolas is missing and presumed dead after an apparent struggle at Wyndemere. 
	* Jason is the prime suspect and a warrant is out for his arrest.
* Lucas is recovering at General Hospital after being attacked and injected with an unknown substance.

* Nathan confesses to Maxie that he shot a man in a jealous rage years ago while married to Claudette. 
	* Maxie is shaken by this revelation and unsure if she can still marry Nathan.
* Hayden's mother, Naomi, arrives unexpectedly, seeking to reconcile and locate missing diamonds. 
	* Hayden is resistant to her mother's attempts and reveals Naomi's past betrayal of her father.
* Franco offers to help Elizabeth seek revenge against Hayden. 
	* Elizabeth initially considers it but ultimately decides against it, feeling too overwhelmed by recent events.

<summary>

<summary>

<summary>

<summary>

<summary>

<summary>
* **The Pathogen:**
    * A deadly pathogen has been released in Port Charles, causing widespread illness.
    * The only known antiserum is in limited supply, leading to difficult decisions about who should receive it.
    * Patrick, a doctor, is racing against time to synthesize more of the antiserum.
* **Jerry's Plan:**
    * Jerry Jacks, revealed to be dying from radiation sickness, has stolen the antiserum and rigged it with a bomb.
    * He plans to escape with his ex-lover, Alexis, while the people of Port Charles face the deadly pathogen.
    * Jerry's brother, Jax, tries to reason with him and save both Alexis and the antiserum.
* **Race Against Time:**
    * Dante and McBain work desperately to defuse the bomb while Lulu refuses to leave their side.
    * Sonny and Shawn team up to rescue Alexis from Jerry's clutches.
    * Carly rushes a wounded Johnny to the hospital, where he hints at a confession.
* **Difficult Choices:**
    * Tracy Quartermaine argues with Monica, the hospital chief of staff, over who should receive the single dose of antiserum.
    * Tracy wants it for her father, Edward, while Monica insists on following federal guidelines.
    * In a surprising turn of events, Edward requests the antiserum be given to Patrick's daughter, Emma.
</summary>

<summary>

<summary>

<summary>
