    • Despite his suspicions, Gus allows Ben to visit his dying grandmother with a police escort.
• Edmund wants to surprise Cassie by restoring a farm for her and her children.
    • He asks Alexandra for advice on how to approach Cassie with the gift.
    • Alexandra uses the opportunity to try and enlist Edmund's help in her plan against Jeffrey.
• Jeffrey is being evicted by Cassie and is suspicious of Ben's story.
    • He believes Ben is faking his memory lapse to get out of trouble.
    • Jeffrey makes a mysterious phone call, asking for a pickup and emphasizing care with the "merchandise."
• Eden maintains her innocence but Gus doesn't believe her.
    • Gus believes Eden has a motive for the murders - to protect her business from Vinnie Salerno.
    • Tony believes Eden and offers to help clear her name.
• Mitch is about to be arrested for the murder of his wife and the attack on Ben.
    • Ross informs Mitch that he can no longer represent him due to a conflict of interest.
    • Mitch asks to make a phone call to Ramona's family before turning himself in.
• Cassie is determined to get rid of all of Jeffrey's belongings from the hotel.
    • She finds out that Jeffrey has more boxes stored in the basement and upstairs.
    • Cassie takes matters into her own hands and goes to check on the boxes herself.
</summary>

<summary>
• **Cyrus' Scheme:**
	• Cyrus is secretly stealing donations from the Spaulding fundraiser.
	• He is using a hidden receiver to obtain the check information.
	• Griggs, his accomplice, is posing as a chauffeur.
• **Marina's Suspicions:**
	• Marina becomes suspicious of Cyrus' activities.
	• She notices interference with her police radio.
	• Marina discovers Cyrus is recording bank account numbers.
• **Harley's Concerns:**
	• Harley confronts Cyrus about his relationship with Marina.
	• She believes he is hurting both Marina and Alexandra.
	• Harley draws parallels to her own experiences with complicated relationships.
• **Relationship Drama:**
	• Matt is upset to see Vanessa with Billy at the fundraiser.
	• Dinah is torn between her feelings for Mallet and Matt.
	• Gus and Natalia reminisce about their past and navigate their feelings.
• **Alan's Intentions:**
	• Alan makes advances towards Natalia, causing tension with Gus.
	• Gus confronts Alan about his behavior and intentions.
	• Alan claims he is not interested in Natalia and was trying to push her towards Gus.
• **Mallet's Troubles:**
	• Frank discovers the stolen money in Mallet's possession.
	• Mallet explains his financial struggles and promises to return the money.
	• Frank is forced to confront Mallet's actions despite their friendship.
• **Alexandra's Fundraiser:**
	• Alexandra hosts a successful fundraiser for the Spaulding Foundation.
	• She aims to outshine Alan and prove her business acumen.
	• Alexandra remains unaware of Cyrus' deceitful actions.
• **The Climax:**
	• Marina confronts Cyrus, revealing she knows about his plan.
	• She realizes he intends to steal from everyone at the party.
	• Marina is determined to stop Cyrus from carrying out his scheme.
</summary>

<summary>
* Shayne is struggling with the aftermath of his accident and refuses to tell the doctor about his prior paralysis.
    * Josh feels guilty, believing his actions led to Shayne's current condition.
    * Shayne pushes Josh away, not wanting his guilt or sympathy.
    * Despite their differences, Josh assures Reva that Shayne is safe.
* Reva is trying to balance her concern for Shayne with her high-risk pregnancy.
    * Jeffrey supports Reva, encouraging her to focus on her health and the baby.
    * Josh updates them on Shayne's condition, adding to Reva's worry.
    * Despite the stress, Reva finds comfort in her doula, Betty.
* Remy is still grieving the loss of Ava and their baby, Max, and avoids discussing it.
    * He confides in Shayne about his loss, revealing the depth of his pain.
    * Mel tries to convince Remy to reconcile with Christina, but he's not ready.
    * Remy's grief is amplified during the holiday season.
* Beth is torn between her feelings for Coop and her relationship with Alan.
    * Coop invites Beth on a trip to Telluride, putting her in a difficult position.
    * Buzz warns Beth about the potential consequences of her actions, concerned for Coop's safety.
    * Beth ultimately chooses to go to Minneapolis, using a law workshop as an excuse.
* Lizzie prioritizes clearing Bill's name over the Macau deal, despite pressure from Alan.
    * Bill encourages Lizzie to go to China, believing it's important for their future.
    * Lizzie ultimately agrees to go but asks Bill to continue investigating the kidnapping.
    * They share a tender Christmas Eve together, hoping for a brighter future.
* Buzz discovers Coop's novel, which mirrors his relationship with Beth.
    * Buzz warns Coop about the dangers of getting involved with Alan.
    * Coop dismisses Buzz's concerns, asserting his independence.
    * Buzz worries about the potential consequences of Coop's actions.
</summary>

<summary>
• Asa and Rae's divorce plans backfire.
    • Rae reveals that she amended the divorce papers to give herself 90% of Asa's assets.
• Todd and Blair reconcile.
    • Blair forgives Todd for his past transgressions, including his actions regarding their son, Jack.
</summary>

<summary>
• **Chloe's Christening:**
    • Jessica and Viki attend Chloe's christening, with Natalie and Jared as godparents.
    • Starr attends the christening late, after dealing with the aftermath of her kidnapping.
• **Cole's Revelation:**
    • Cole reveals to Starr that he knows Hope didn't die from Rh disease.
    • They both vow to find out the truth about Hope's death.
• **Natalie and Jared's Secret:**
    • It's revealed that Natalie and Jared switched Starr and Cole's baby with another.
    • They vow to keep the secret to protect Jessica.
• **Todd and Téa's Deal:**
    • Todd and Téa sleep together as part of a deal for Téa to help Todd get his kids back.
    • Téa reveals she won't uphold her end of the deal because she believes Todd is a bad father.
• **The Serial Killer Case:**
    • The police find a knife with Blair's blood on it.
    • The fingerprint on the knife belongs to John McBain.
</summary>

<summary>
* Natalie and Brody discuss John's suspicion of Natalie pushing Marty down the stairs.
	* Brody assures Natalie that John didn't truly believe she was guilty.
* Todd tries to convince Dani of his innocence while Dani remains skeptical.
	* Dani struggles with her feelings towards Todd, wanting to believe him but finding it difficult.
* Téa reveals to Blair that she is dying and wants to ensure Dani has Todd in her life.
	* Blair disagrees with Téa's decision, believing Dani is better off without Todd.
* Rex receives a lead on his biological parents from a silversmith in Santa Fe.
	* He plans to travel there to investigate further.
* Langston confesses to Markko that she is in love with Ford, his T.A.
	* Markko is devastated by the news and feels betrayed.
* Kelly receives a visit from Reed Wagner, who claims to know her from London.
	* Dorian encourages Kelly to pursue a relationship with Reed.
</summary>

<summary>
• **Viki's Health:**
	• Viki experiences chest pain while visiting Ben at the hospital and is diagnosed with a coronary episode.
	• Dorian inquires about Viki's prognosis, learning that her condition is serious and options are limited. 

• **John and Nora:**
	• John contemplates moving on from Natalie and shares his feelings with Nora.
	• Nora advises John to find healthier ways to cope with his grief, suggesting that he's not truly ready to move on.

• **Michael and Marcie's Concerns:**
	• Michael experiences paranoia and believes Dr. Long is stalking him after finding a broken window.
	• Marcie decides to take matters into her own hands and goes to Dr. Long's office to find evidence against him.

• **Paul and Kelly's Conflict:**
	• David overhears Kelly wishing Paul were dead and confronts him, believing Paul is harming her.
	• Paul denies hurting Kelly, claiming she is overreacting and took sleeping pills on her own.

• **Other Notable Events:**
	• John questions Dr. Long about illegal organ harvesting but lacks concrete evidence.
	• Lindsay seeks comfort from Jen but is rejected due to her involvement with Rex.
</summary>

<summary>
• John suspects Miles of being involved in Todd's disappearance and follows him.
    • John plays a recording of a baby crying found at Todd's last known location for Miles, but Miles doesn't react.
    • John follows Miles and finds him with Marty, who has been attacked.
    • Miles claims he was delayed in rescuing Marty because John detained him at the police station.
• Jessica tells Antonio she's in love with Nash, leaving Antonio devastated and feeling betrayed by both Jessica and Cristian.
    • Jessica admits to Antonio that she's been in love with Nash all along and that their marriage was a mistake.
    • Antonio is furious with Cristian for knowing about Jessica's feelings for Nash and not telling him.
    • Cristian defends his actions, saying he was trying to protect Antonio and believed Jessica when she said she loved him.
• Viki and Clint search desperately for a way to help Jessica, who is running out of time.
    • Viki learns that she can't be a donor for Jessica because of a previous surgery.
    • Clint and Viki decide to explore experimental treatments and contact the National Institute of Health for help.
    • Nigel offers support to Viki, assuring her that Jessica needs her love and strength to survive.
</summary>

<summary>
* Todd's Disappearance
	* Hunter moved Todd from Chicago, leaving Sarah worried about his fate and facing potential charges as an accessory to murder.
	* Blair arrived in Chicago, blaming Sarah for Todd's disappearance and demanding answers.
* Hunter and Miles' Deal
	* Hunter brought Todd's body to Miles' apartment, demanding payment for his services.
	* Miles, fearful of exposure, paid Hunter but was left to deal with the unconscious Todd.
* Marty and John's Conflict
	* John urged Marty to leave Miles, fearing for her safety and believing Miles was manipulating her.
	* Marty, torn between protecting John and fearing for Cole's well-being, refused to leave, believing she could handle Miles.
* Dorian's Jealousy and Clint's Frustration
	* Dorian, jealous of David's presence at Viki's, confronted them, only to find Clint gone upon her return.
	* Clint, frustrated with Dorian's antics, questioned her judgment and expressed his disappointment.
* Viki and David's Dynamic
	* David, staying at Viki's, made advances, proposing a casual relationship, which Viki firmly declined.
	* Viki, while flattered by David's attention, established clear boundaries, offering him companionship but nothing more. 
</summary>

<summary>
* John and Bo are working on the case of the missing Natalie.
    * John feels guilty about Natalie's kidnapping and Evangeline's attack.
    * Bo is concerned about Nora's well-being.
    * They are trying to find the killer by analyzing Marcie's book and journals.
    * They hope to find Natalie before it's too late.
* Viki is distraught over Natalie's disappearance and blames Marcie for writing the book that inspired the killer.
    * She is frustrated with Marcie's apologies and wants her to take action.
    * She holds onto hope that Natalie is still alive.
    * She is worried about Jessica's sudden disappearance.
    * She finds solace in Antonio's support.
* Rex is consumed by guilt, believing his actions led to Natalie's kidnapping.
    * He confesses to Lindsay about the fake note he sent to Natalie.
    * He believes he deserves the pain and suffering he's experiencing.
    * Lindsay comforts him, assuring him it's not his fault.
    * She reminds him of his growth and the good he has done.
* Jessica has left town, leaving a note for Antonio explaining she needs time to heal.
    * Todd acts as a messenger between Jessica and Antonio, delivering her note.
    * Antonio is concerned about Jessica's well-being but respects her need for space.
    * Viki is worried about Jessica but tries to reassure Antonio.
    * Todd seems to know more about Jessica's situation than he reveals.
* Tess, feeling slighted by her husband, steals his car after being denied lunch.
    * She tries to charm a wealthy man into buying her lunch but is rejected.
    * Insulted and angry, she takes her husband's car from valet parking.
    * The valet is unable to stop her as she speeds off.
    * Tess's husband is furious when he discovers his car is missing. 
</summary>

<summary>
• The episode revolves around the "Killing Club" storyline, where:
    • Hayes, the killer, kidnaps Rex and Marcie.
    • He plans to kill them using a contraption with sandbags and ropes.
    • John and the police try to get information from a wounded Nick to find their location.
• Relationships are tested and developed:
    • Blair and Starr have a heart-to-heart, addressing Starr's struggles and Blair's past trauma.
    • Dorian and David disagree over involving their respective brothers in their wedding.
    • Adriana worries about Rex's safety and confides in Dorian and David.
• Tess continues to be mysterious:
    • She asks Nash about his past and seems to be running from something.
    • Tess contacts Rich for more money and arranges a meeting.
    • She hints at taking on a new identity, possibly leaving her past behind. 
</summary>

<summary>
• **Political Intrigue:**
	• Asa suspects Willy Dawes is behind the chandelier incident that almost killed Kelly.
	• Asa wants to use Dawes's infidelity against him, but Kevin refuses to resort to dirty tactics.
	• Asa tasks Cristian with finding damaging information on Dawes.
	• Kevin is investigating Dawes's construction contracts for evidence of wrongdoing.

• **Custody Battle:**
	• Antonio and Keri face off in court over custody of their daughter, Jamie.
	• Carlotta and Rae testify in support of Antonio, while R.J. vehemently opposes him.
	• Bo vouches for Antonio's character and parenting abilities.
	• The judge ultimately grants joint custody to Antonio and Keri.

• **Al's Health Crisis:**
	• Al's condition worsens, and he develops a life-threatening liver complication.
	• Marcie is determined to stay strong for Al and help him recover.
	• Jen offers Marcie support and a place to stay.
	• Larry informs Max and Gabrielle that Al needs a liver transplant to survive.

• **Blair and Todd's Growing Connection:**
	• Todd surprises Blair by playing the piano and singing for her.
	• Blair is touched by Todd's gesture and enjoys his company.
	• Todd expresses his feelings for Blair and asks her to dance.
	• Blair is drawn to Todd but still wary of his past.

• **David's Return and Dorian's Scheme:**
	• David returns to Llanview, claiming to be in love with Dorian.
	• Kelly is skeptical of David's feelings and suspects Dorian is manipulating him.
	• Dorian tasks David with driving a wedge between Kelly and Kevin.
	• David attempts to rekindle his old flame with Kelly, but she remains committed to her husband.

• **Marcie's Love and Support:**
	• Marcie is deeply in love with Al and devastated by his illness.
	• She finds solace in her faith and the support of her friends.
	• Marcie dedicates a song to Al on his radio show, urging listeners to send him their prayers.
	• Her love for Al shines through as she remains hopeful for his recovery.
</summary>

<summary>
* Rex told his ex-wife Gigi that they are not sleeping together. Gigi is furious and confronts Adriana, thinking that Rex is interested in her.
    * Rex and Kelly got locked in the steam room.
    * Gigi had a fight with Adriana.
    * Rex asked Kelly out on a date.
* Cole is being sent to prison. He broke up with Starr, asking her to move on.
    * Cole is worried about Starr and their baby.
    * Starr is heartbroken but promised to wait for Cole.
    * John drove Cole to the prison. 
</summary>

<summary>
• **Financial Troubles:**
    • The Lopez-Fitzgerald family faces financial hardship as Luis, Pilar, and Miguel lose their jobs due to Rebecca's machinations. They are in danger of losing their home.
• **Rebecca's Cruelty:**
    • Rebecca continues to torment Theresa by abusing little Ethan and plotting to evict the Lopez-Fitzgeralds from their home.
• **Whitney's Singing Career:**
    • Liz offers Whitney a singing job at the Blue Note, which Whitney accepts despite knowing her mother would disapprove.
• **Ethan's Dilemma:**
    • Rebecca forces Ethan to evict the Lopez-Fitzgeralds by threatening to reveal his past infidelity to Gwen.
• **T.C.'s Misguided Belief:**
    • T.C. mistakenly believes that Chad is the source of Whitney's problems and that Eve is a perfect wife and mother.
</summary>

<summary>
* **Sheridan and Antonio's ordeal:**
    * Sheridan is hospitalized after Luis rescues her from a fire at Antonio's house, which is believed to be arson.
    * Antonio is determined to stay by Sheridan's side as she recovers.
* **Liz's manipulation and Tom's return:**
    * Liz continues to manipulate T.C. with her fabricated story of abuse, driving a wedge between him and Eve.
    * Tom Joyner, a former Crane Industries employee with a grudge against Julian, returns to Harmony, seeking revenge.
* **Theresa's philanthropy and Julian's scheme:**
    * Theresa decides to donate the Crane fortune to various charities, much to Julian and Rebecca's dismay.
    * Julian and Rebecca obtain information from Tom that could potentially ruin Theresa and strip her of her wealth.
* **Chad and Whitney's reunion:**
    * Chad and Whitney reconcile after the fire, realizing the importance of their relationship.
    * They decide to go public with their love, no longer wanting to hide their feelings.
</summary>

<summary>
* **Family Feud:**
    * T.C. blames Eve for Whitney giving their grandson up for adoption.
    * Liz supports T.C. and accuses Eve of manipulating Whitney.
    * Julian defends Eve and proposes they adopt the baby.
    * Tabitha relishes the drama and predicts a fight over the baby.

* **D.N.A. Deception:**
    * Sheridan insists on a D.N.A. test to prove Marty is her son.
    * Beth vehemently refuses, raising Luis's suspicions.
    * Mrs. Wallace eagerly anticipates Beth's downfall.
    * Luis ultimately sides with Sheridan, demanding the test.

* **Island Intrigue:**
    * Ethan and Fox escape prison with Fox's quick thinking.
    * Ethan grapples with choosing between Gwen and Theresa.
    * Fox offers support and understands Ethan's dilemma.
    * Theresa surprises them by sneaking onto the rescue plane.

* **Gwen's Rage:**
    * Theresa confronts Gwen, revealing she can walk again.
    * Gwen threatens Theresa, blaming her for all her misfortune.
    * Katherine tries to intervene and calm Gwen down.
    * Gwen nearly attacks Theresa with scissors but stops herself.
</summary>

<summary>
* Whitney's mother, Eve, supports her decision to move to L.A. with Chad, which angers Whitney's father, T.C.
    * Eve is secretly trying to protect Whitney from Liz.
* Liz is pleased that her plan to destroy Eve's family is working.
    * Liz reveals to Eve that she hates her more than she loves Whitney.
* Kay goes into premature labor.
    * Kay is concerned that the premature birth will ruin her chances of getting Miguel.
* Tabitha gives birth to a demon baby.
    * Charity witnesses the birth and is terrified.
* The Blue Note is burned down in a fire.
    * Julian claims responsibility for the fire, but it is hinted that he is covering for someone.
* Luis is convinced that Sheridan did not leave on her own and is determined to find her.
    * Beth is confident that no one will find Sheridan in her basement.
* The episode ends with Charity sensing something is wrong with Tabitha's baby.
    * Charity's premonition suggests that the demon baby will bring danger. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Jessica's family stages an intervention to help her leave her abusive husband, Spike.
    * Spike threatens to reveal damaging information about Jessica if she testifies against him.
    * Jessica initially agrees to leave Spike but ultimately returns to him due to fear and manipulation.
    * Noah physically attacks Spike, leading to a potential arrest.
    * Sam encourages Jessica to go back to therapy.
* Kay is torn between Fox and Miguel.
    * Endora, a witch, may have magically influenced Kay's feelings and situation.
    * Kay finds herself mysteriously transported to a romantic location with Miguel.
    * Miguel confesses his love for Kay and proposes marriage.
    * Kay is confused and unsure of her true feelings.
* Sheridan reaffirms her commitment to Chris despite Luis's attempts to rekindle their relationship.
    * Sheridan witnesses a seemingly compromising moment between Luis and Fancy, causing her distress.
    * Luis explains that the situation was part of an undercover operation.
    * Luis professes his love for Sheridan and urges her to leave Chris.
    * Sheridan insists that she wants to be with Chris and their adopted son, James.
* Gwen and Ethan are interrupted by mysterious noises in their hotel room, possibly coming from Rebecca and J.T.
    * Theresa and Jared are also in the hotel and become involved in the commotion.
    * Gwen tries to prevent the others from discovering Rebecca and J.T.'s presence.
    * The source of the noises is eventually revealed to be Rebecca and J.T. having sex on the ledge outside the hotel room.
    * The situation creates tension and awkwardness between the couples.
</summary>

<summary>
• Kay is torn between marrying Fox, who was there for her and Maria while Miguel was gone, and Miguel, who has returned and wants to be a family with them.
    • Fox finds out he is dying and wants to marry Kay as soon as possible.
    • Kay finds out about Fox's illness and feels she can't break up with him now.
    • Miguel is understanding but wants to be with Kay and Maria.
• Fancy is trapped down a hole and Luis suspects Chris is involved.
    • Luis finds Fancy's cell phone near the caves and later finds Chris there with rope and a flashlight.
    • Chris claims he was just trying to help and that his presence is a coincidence.
    • Luis doesn't believe Chris and accuses him of trying to hurt Fancy.
• Gwen and Theresa try to bribe J.T. for information about Ethan.
    • J.T. plays them against each other, promising the information to whoever pays him the most.
    • Gwen wins the bidding war, using money from her grandmother's jewelry and her mother's divorce settlement.
    • Theresa is furious and vows to tell Ethan the truth about Gwen and Rebecca's scheme. 
</summary>

<summary>
• **Ian's Struggle:**
	• Ian is struggling with his bloodlust and needs more blood from Chris.
	• He fears he will turn Lucy into a vampire.
	• Chris is concerned about the risks of helping Ian.
	• Ian admits he needs the blood to resist feeding on Lucy.

• **Alison's Captivity:**
	• Joshua holds Alison captive and claims to desire her.
	• He reveals his past friendship with Alison's father, Malcolm.
	• Joshua claims Malcolm taught him to seek power and money.
	• Alison doesn't believe Joshua's claims about her father.

• **Lucy's Loss of Power:**
	• Lucy has lost her slayer powers and feels useless.
	• Elizabeth asks for Lucy's help in finding Alison.
	• Lucy is initially hesitant but then decides to use her intuition.
	• Lucy faints while gathering her divination tools.

• **Jamal and Rafe's Confrontation:**
	• Jamal is revealed to be a vampire working for Joshua.
	• Rafe questions Jamal about Alison's whereabouts.
	• Jamal refuses to help Rafe and fights him.
	• Lisa finds Jamal injured after the fight.

• **Kevin's Addiction:**
	• Kevin asks Karen for help with his drug addiction.
	• He wants to know the ingredients of the drug Joshua gave him.
	• Karen believes Kevin wants to make the drug himself.
	• Kevin claims the drug has improved his life.

• **Joshua's Past:**
	• Joshua reveals his mother was a housekeeper for Alison's family.
	• He was friends with Malcolm but felt treated as a servant.
	• Joshua sought power and money to escape his past.
	• He denies killing Malcolm.

• **Other Notable Events:**
	• Frank instructed Stacey to keep an eye on Jamal.
	• Stacey reveals Jamal is a "virgin vampire."
	• Chris provides Ian with more blood.

• **Cliffhangers:**
	• What will happen to Lucy after she faints?
	• Will Rafe find Alison?
	• Will Kevin overcome his addiction?

• **Next on Port Charles: Desire:**
	• Kevin confronts Ian about Lucy.
	• Livvie decides to leave.
	• Rafe confronts Joshua about Alison.
</summary>

<summary>
• Adam and Sharon are trying to prove Adam's innocence.
    • Sharon believes Victor set Adam up and asks for his help.
• Nick is angry with Sharon for leaving Faith to go to Hawaii and for defending Adam.
    • He plans to file for full custody of Faith.
• Daniel is in critical condition after being found unconscious with a head injury.
    • Daisy attacked him and left him for dead.
• Daisy is on the run with her newborn baby.
    • She was last seen in Canada.
• Cane is in trouble after Blake failed to deliver the report.
    • Neil and Sofia are furious and plan to fire Blake.
• Colin is trying to spend time with Lily and his grandchildren.
    • Blake is suspicious of Colin's motives.
• Phyllis is distraught over Daniel's condition and blames herself for helping Daisy.
    • She vows to find Daisy and make her pay.
• Cane tries to cover for Blake, but Neil and Sofia are not happy.
    • They demand that Cane fire Blake.
</summary>

<summary>
• **Victor's Legal Troubles:**
    • Victor faces a lawsuit from his daughters, Victoria and Abby, who accuse him of mismanaging their trusts. The court orders a forensic accounting of Newman Enterprises' finances.
• **The Dubai Deal:**
    •  Despite the accounting report showing no wrongdoing by Victor, Vance, Victoria, and Abby's lawyer, reveals Victor's plan to sell a major subsidiary in Dubai, arguing it will devalue Newman Enterprises.
• **Jack's Investigation in Hawaii:**
    • Jack travels to Hawaii and finds the burned-down shack where Skye lived. He discovers a bottle of her rare perfume, strengthening his belief that Victor is responsible for her disappearance.
• **Ronan's Illness and Nina's Decision:**
    • Nina learns about Ronan's illness and decides to get tested as a potential liver donor. Ronan, initially resistant, eventually reveals he tracked down his biological father, but he died from the same disease.
• **Heather's Discovery:**
    • Heather listens to the wire recording from the day Chance was shot and, with Paul's help, realizes the gunshots were blanks, suggesting Ronan didn't kill Chance.
</summary>

<summary>
* Lily and Tyler get stuck in an elevator.
    * Tyler is claustrophobic and starts to panic.
    * Lily helps him by telling him jokes and making up stories.
    * Cane is jealous when he finds out.
* Chelsea considers Cane's offer to help her start a fashion line.
    * Cane is impressed by her designs.
    * Anita encourages Chelsea to move on from Adam.
    * Chelsea feels guilty about her attraction to Cane.
* Jamie accuses Fenmore of pushing him off the roof.
    * Summer feels guilty about her role in the bullying.
    * Lauren and Michael are terrified of the possibility that Fenmore might be responsible.
    * Paul tries to mediate the situation.
* Fenmore maintains his innocence.
    * He feels betrayed by his father, Michael.
    * He believes Jamie is trying to hurt him.
    * He is angry at Summer for using him.
* Jamie is adamant that Fenmore pushed him.
    * He says Fenmore was laughing while he did it.
    * He wants to press charges against Fenmore.
    * He believes Lauren is blind to Fenmore's true nature.
* Leslie and Neil's relationship progresses.
    * Leslie is hesitant to open up to Neil about her past.
    * Neil is patient and understanding.
    * They decide to take things slow.
* Summer regrets bullying Jamie.
    * She admits to Paul that she was the one behind the bullying.
    * She wishes she could take it all back.
* Michael tries to support Fenmore.
    * He is torn between his role as a father and a D.A.
    * He tries to get Fenmore to open up to him.
    * He assures Fenmore of his love and support.
* Paul acts as a mediator and friend.
    * He tries to get Jamie to open up to him.
    * He advises Jamie to think carefully about pressing charges.
    * He offers support to Lauren and Michael.
</summary>

<summary>
• Victor and Nick clash over Jabot's debt
    • Nick buys Jabot's debt through Newman Enterprises, intending to foreclose.
    • Victor, having promised the Abbotts he wouldn't take over Jabot, offers to buy the debt himself to stop Nick.
• Jack proposes a plan to save Jabot
    • He calls an emergency shareholder meeting, revealing Nick's actions and Victor's involvement.
    • Jack proposes Chancellor Industries buy a 51% stake in Jabot to prevent a complete takeover.
• Malcolm awaits paternity test results
    • He worries about the impact on his relationship with Neil and Drucilla if he is Lily's father.
    • Drucilla fears Phyllis will reveal the truth about the paternity test.
• Devon feels like an outsider
    • He's hurt that Drucilla forgot his birthday and feels like a nuisance.
    • Lily reassures him that he's part of the family now.
</summary>

<summary>
* Jack and Sharon move out of the Abbott mansion.
    * Gloria and Jeff now have the mansion to themselves.
    * Jack is upset about having to leave his childhood home.
* Gloria is trying to reconcile with her sons, but they are still angry with her for her past actions.
    * Kevin and Michael refuse to attend a party at the mansion.
    * Gloria blames Jeff for her sons' anger.
* Jill and Kay are working with Alistair to figure out why Gloria married Jeff.
    * They believe that Gloria must have a secret.
    * Alistair is learning about John Abbott's personality to better portray him.
* Nick and Phyllis are working on the Beauty of Nature campaign.
    * Adam gives Phyllis an expensive gift, which makes Nick uncomfortable.
    * Nick believes that Adam has a crush on Phyllis.
* Victoria is struggling to work with Adam.
    * She believes that he is trying to undermine her.
    * Adam claims that he is just trying to find his place at Newman.
* Victor is in Los Angeles with Sabrina.
    * They are visiting art galleries and discussing the work of Jeff Koons and Damien Hirst.
    * Sabrina suggests that Victor could make a similar impact on Genoa City.
* Amber and Daniel are having creative differences over the Restless Style photo shoot.
    * Amber believes that she knows the target market better than Daniel.
    * Daniel is frustrated by Amber's constantly changing opinions.
* Jana asks Amber to be her maid of honor.
    * Amber is thrilled and offers to design Jana's wedding dress.
    * Kevin and Jana are still deciding on a wedding date and location.
* Jeff is staying at a hotel for a few days to give Gloria some space.
    * He believes that absence will make her realize that she is attracted to him.
    * Gloria is lonely without her sons and is starting to regret her actions.
* Alistair enjoys a meal with Jill and Kay.
    * He learns about Gloria's expensive tastes.
    * Jeff encounters them and makes a comment about Gloria.
</summary>

<summary>
* Adam is dead.
	* The police found Adam's body in the basement of the Athletic Club.
* The police are searching for Adam's killer.
	* The police searched the Newman ranch and are treating Adam's death as a homicide.
* Jack is a person of interest in Adam's murder.
	* The police found Jack's monogrammed handkerchief in Adam's mouth.
* Phyllis is worried that Nick might be a suspect in Adam's murder.
	* Nick's jacket has a bloodstain on it, and Phyllis is worried that the police will find it.
* Ryder met Abby at Crimson Lights.
	* Ryder told Abby that he had to leave because he didn't want his family to know he was there.
* Lauren is being held captive by Sheila.
	* Sheila is alive and is using her children, Ryder and Daisy, to get revenge on Lauren.
</summary>

<summary>
* Jack and Genevieve's Wedding:
    * Genevieve makes excuses to travel to Las Vegas separately for the wedding.
    * Nikki follows Jack to Las Vegas to try and stop the wedding.
* Victor's Schemes:
    * Nikki overhears Victor and Chelsea discussing how Victor hired Chelsea to seduce Billy.
    * Victor tries to pay Chelsea off to leave town and keep quiet.
* Chelsea's Guilt and Adam's Support:
    * Chelsea confesses to Adam her guilt over her role in Billy's imprisonment.
    * Adam comforts Chelsea and acknowledges Victor's manipulative tendencies.
* Devon's Hearing and Tucker's Support:
    * Devon's hearing improves significantly after his surgery.
    * Devon, Harmony, and Tucker bond over music and family.
* Custody Battle over Lucy:
    * The custody hearing for Lucy is scheduled.
    * Daisy plots to manipulate the situation to her advantage.
* Avery and Phyllis's Reactions to George's Death:
    * Avery grieves the loss of her idealized image of her father.
    * Phyllis believes her father's last gift was meant to manipulate her.
</summary>

<summary>
• **Legal Troubles:**
    • Lauren is arrested for pulling a gun on Daisy.
    • The S.E.C. is investigating Victor's purchase of Beauty of Nature.
    • Daisy wins full custody of Lucy, with a court review in six months.
    • Michael is busy dealing with both Lauren's arrest and the S.E.C. investigation.
• **Business Deals and Disputes:**
    • Genevieve sells Beauty of Nature to Victor.
    • Victor worries that the S.E.C. will investigate the sale.
    • Genevieve proposes that Tucker pretend he loaned her the money for the purchase.
    • Tucker agrees to the plan.
• **Family Conflicts:**
    • Phyllis is furious with Daisy for gaining custody of Lucy.
    • Nick asks Victor to help Daniel regain custody.
    • Avery feels caught between her sister and Phyllis.
    • Michael and Lauren prepare to go to Canada to bring Fen home.
• **Romantic Relationships:**
    • Devon celebrates his successful music career with Roxanne, Neil, Sofia, Ashley, and Tucker.
    • Neil and Harmony argue about their relationship.
    • Katherine questions Harmony about her feelings for Neil.
    • Devon plans a romantic getaway with Roxanne.
• **Deceptions and Secrets:**
    • Tucker reveals to Sofia and Katherine that his fight with Sofia was a lie.
    • Harmony hides her true feelings from Katherine.
    • Genevieve hides the source of her funds from Victor.
</summary>

<summary>
* It's Nick and Phyllis' first anniversary.
    * They celebrate with a treasure hunt created by Nick.
* Lily lost her baby.
    * She tries to cope by keeping busy with work and avoiding talking about it. 
</summary>

<summary>
• **Legal Troubles:**
    • Lauren faces felony assault charges from Spencer, but Avery negotiates a plea deal with community service.
• **Family Matters:**
    • Phyllis announces her engagement to Nick and her pregnancy, while Daniel reveals his plan to remarry Daisy.
• **Ricky's Schemes:**
    • Ricky tries to gain sympathy from Paul by faking a letter from his mother, but his plan backfires. He remains determined to take down Phyllis.
• **Genevieve's Struggles:**
    • Genevieve faces the SEC investigation and clashes with Jill. Cane helps her navigate the situation, but she remains vulnerable. 
</summary>

<summary>
* John is released from the hospital and Kevin visits him to thank him for giving Gloria a second chance.
    * John is not receptive to Kevin's plea and tells him that he has not changed his mind about Gloria.
* Cassie is in the hospital after the accident and her memory starts to come back.
    * She remembers that she was driving the car.
* Michael wins the lottery and buys Lauren an expensive dress designed by Eric Forrester.
    * He takes her out for a night on the town.
</summary>

<summary>
* Nick and Sharon are struggling with the anniversary of Cassie's death.
    * Nick is reminded of Cassie when he sees Summer growing up.
    * Sharon is having a hard time coping and feels like her life is falling apart.
    * Sharon is having troubling thoughts and feelings, and is not sure how much is related to her mental health.
* Summer throws a party at Phyllis's apartment and things get out of hand.
    * Fenmore gets drunk and tries to kiss Summer.
    * Kyle shows up and gets into a fight with Fenmore.
    * Nick finds out and is furious with Summer for lying and drinking.
* Michael is still struggling to forgive Lauren for her affair with Carmine.
    * He leaves after an argument with her.
    * Fenmore witnesses the argument and is worried that his parents are getting a divorce.
    * Lauren is heartbroken and doesn't know how to fix her marriage.
* Carmine continues to pursue Lauren despite warnings from Abby and Paul.
    * Abby warns Carmine to stay away from Lauren and tells him to leave her alone.
    * Paul threatens Carmine with a stalking charge if he doesn't leave Lauren alone.
    * Carmine is frustrated but doesn't seem to be backing down.
* Kyle develops feelings for Summer.
    * He defends her to Nick and Phyllis.
    * He tells Jack that he is interested in Summer.
    * Jack advises Kyle against pursuing Summer because of Nick's disapproval.
* Sharon is struggling with her feelings for Adam.
    * She feels like she made a mistake by trusting him.
    * She confesses to Dr. Watkins that she has been seeing Adam.
    * She feels lost and lonely and wants to go back to a time when Cassie was alive.
* Fenmore is angry and upset with Summer for what happened at the party.
    * He feels like she set him up and is using him to get to Kyle.
    * He is also upset with his parents for lying to him about the strength of their marriage.
    * He feels like everyone is lying to him and that he can't trust anyone. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Chloe is missing and may be arrested for violating her probation.
    * She skipped her therapy appointment and lied to Chelsea about it.
    * Kevin is trying to find her before the police do.
    * He believes she needs to be in Fairview but wants to take her himself.
* Ian is free after the extortion charges against him were dropped.
    * He taunts Nikki and Dylan with his freedom.
    * Victor threatens Ian, leading to a confrontation.
    * Paul warns Victor and Dylan against engaging with Ian.
* Avery is conflicted between her relationship with Dylan and her web series.
    * She gets upset when Dylan confronts her about Ian's harassment.
    * She leaves her shoot to be with Dylan.
    * She worries about Summer's growing feelings for Austin.
* Summer bonds with Austin over their shared experience of losing a parent.
    * She opens up to him about her mother's coma.
    * Austin reveals that he lost his mother a few years ago.
    * Avery warns Austin not to lead Summer on, but he reveals he has broken up with his girlfriend.
* Kevin finds Chloe at the movie theater where they had their last date.
    * Chloe is guilt-ridden and wishes she could go back to that night.
    * She admits to Kevin that she drugged Billy and took Connor in a desperate attempt to replace Delia.
    * Kevin realizes that he can't help Chloe on his own and agrees to get her professional help.
* Dylan is angry about Ian's freedom and wants to see him punished.
    * He makes veiled threats towards Ian.
    * He contacts Willa, offering to pay for information that could put Ian away.
* Victor takes matters into his own hands and confronts Ian.
    * He ignores Paul's warnings and physically attacks Ian.
* Paul and Christine celebrate Paul's birthday.
    * Christine expresses her concern about Ian's presence in their lives.
    * Paul admits to feeling guilty for not recognizing Ian's true nature sooner.
    * Christine steers the conversation towards a more romantic direction. 
</summary>

<summary>
• Nick is haunted by Cassie's death and blames himself for it.
    • He believes that if he had not let Cassie go out that night, she would still be alive.
    • He also believes that his actions after her death, such as hiding Cassie's clothes and pushing Sharon away, were wrong.
• Nick is shown a vision of what life would be like if he had made different choices.
    • He sees that Daniel and Lily would be happy together, and that his family would be whole again.
    • However, Cassie tells him that this is just his imagination and that he cannot change the past.
• Nick realizes that he needs to stop blaming himself and move on with his life.
    • He apologizes to Sharon for his past behavior and tells her that he wants to come home.
    • He also vows to be a better father to Noah.
</summary>

<summary>
• **Newman Enterprises IPO:**
	• Newman Enterprises goes public.
	• Jack plans to short the stock, believing it will fall.
	• Michael is optimistic about the IPO's success.
	• Adam is secretly working against Victor.

• **Daisy's Custody Hearing:**
	• Daisy fights for custody of Lucy, claiming she's changed.
	• Phyllis supports Daisy, hoping to gain custody of Lucy herself.
	• Billy and Victoria oppose Daisy's petition.
	• Daniel testifies against Daisy, revealing her past actions.

• **Diane's Pregnancy:**
	• Diane tells Victor she's pregnant with his child.
	• Victor is skeptical but agrees to support her until paternity is confirmed.
	• Diane experiences complications and is rushed to the hospital.
	• Victor stays by Diane's side at the hospital.

• **Other Events:**
	• Genevieve, a wealthy woman, arrives in Genoa City and takes an interest in Jack.
	• Lauren is furious about Daisy's custody hearing and tries to intervene.
	• Gloria and Jeff observe the interactions between Jack and Genevieve.
</summary>

<summary>
• Kevin kidnapped Phyllis to trade for Chloe, but she escaped.
    • He lied to Adam about Phyllis being free.
    • Adam wants Kevin to stay in town and help him with something.
• Adam is suing Nick for full custody of Christian.
    • Victoria offered to buy Dark Horse back, but Adam refused.
    • Nick asked Michael to be his lawyer.
• Devon apologized to Elena for paying off her student loans without talking to her.
    • He explained that he didn't mean to make her feel disrespected.
    • Elena forgave him.
• Mariah gave Devon advice about his relationship with Elena.
    • She explained that his money will always be a factor in his relationships.
    • She advised him to talk to Elena and listen to her feelings.
• Nate also gave Elena advice about her relationship with Devon.
    • He explained that Devon is generous because he knows what it's like to be broke.
    • He encouraged her to talk to Devon and give him another chance.
• Adam met with Riza at the end of the episode.
    • Riza wants to know why Adam is suddenly interested in her.
    • It seems like they might be working together.
</summary>

<summary>
* Kevin is moving to Portland with Bella.
    * He says he needs a new start and that there are too many bad memories in Genoa City.
    * Michael is concerned about Kevin and doesn't think it's a good idea for him to move.
* Nikki is having second thoughts about the concert.
    * She initially agreed to do it to prove to Victor that she could, but now she's doing it for herself.
    * Nick is worried about Nikki's health and doesn't think she should perform.
* Chelsea asks Sharon to come back to work at Chelsea 2.0.
    * Sharon is flattered but declines the offer because she's too busy.
    * Chelsea is disappointed but understands.
* Victor gives Abby a necklace for Nikki to wear at the concert.
    * He hopes the concert will help bring the Newman family back together.
    * Abby is grateful for Victor's approval and wants to help him reunite the family. 
</summary>

<summary>
* Sharon is struggling with Nick's absence and believes he's chosen Phyllis.
    \t* Nick confirms the baby is his and tells Phyllis he wants to be with Sharon.
* Colleen is disturbed by mysterious notes and calls, suspecting a connection to her father's past.
    \t*  JT investigates the Kaplan murders in Cleveland, discovering a shocking link to Brad.
* Daniel and Kevin are being blackmailed by Alex, who threatens to expose their actions and harm Lily.
    \t* Kevin gets $10,000 from Gloria but Alex demands more, revealing he made a copy of the incriminating tape.
* JT is investigating Brad's past, uncovering information about his family and a possible connection to a murder.
    \t* JT interviews Cindy Sherman, who identifies Brad as George Kaplan, the son of the murdered couple.
* Phyllis is pregnant with Nick's child but decides to raise the baby alone.
    \t*  Despite Phyllis's decision, Nick chooses to stay with Sharon and be a father to Noah. 
</summary>

<summary>
• **Phyllis is fired from Restless Style:**
    • Billy fires Phyllis from Restless Style due to pressure from the backers of his new TV series, who are uncomfortable with her attempted murder charge.
    • Billy plans to exploit Phyllis's story for the magazine and his TV show, promising to put her on the next cover and feature her in the pilot episode.
• **Victoria is offered multiple job opportunities:**
    • Both Jack and Ashley offer Victoria a job, at Beauty of Nature and Jabot respectively, leading to a conflict between the siblings.
    • Victor also tries to convince Victoria to return to Newman Enterprises, arguing that Jack's intentions are not entirely pure.
• **Adam and Chelsea get married and settle into their new home:**
    • Adam and Chelsea elope to Kansas and get married, keeping it a secret from their families.
    • Adam surprises Chelsea with a luxurious new home, fulfilling his promise of a perfect life together.
• **Jack consolidates his power at Jabot:**
    • Jack secretly meets with two key board members to secure their votes and maintain his position as CEO of Jabot.
    • Ashley confronts Jack about his underhanded tactics, threatening to call a board meeting to challenge his actions.
• **Nick punches Billy for exploiting Phyllis:**
    • Nick confronts Billy for exploiting Phyllis's situation for profit and punches him in the face.
    • Billy reveals that cameras have been installed in the office and everything was recorded, potentially creating more trouble for Nick.
• **Phyllis considers fighting back against Billy:**
    • Phyllis feels helpless and wants to defend herself publicly but is advised against it by Nick and Avery.
    • Despite the risks, Phyllis decides to start a blog to share her side of the story.
• **Anita returns and causes trouble for Jeff:**
    • Anita returns to Genoa City and reveals to Gloria that she and Jeff are still married.
    • Jeff tries to convince Gloria that Anita is lying, but Gloria is determined to uncover the truth herself.
• **Sharon navigates her relationship with Victor:**
    • Sharon enjoys her new horse and the freedom it brings but is reminded of Victor's priorities when he prioritizes work over spending time with her.
    • Ashley warns Sharon about Victor's true nature and advises her not to get her hopes up about changing him.
• **Nikki and Victoria bond over wedding preparations and career choices:**
    • Nikki

<summary>
* Hilary and Devon's Wedding:
    * Hilary and Devon get married in the hospital room as Hilary is unwell.
    * Hilary knows her condition is worsening but wants to enjoy her wedding day.
* Lily's Guilt and Support:
    * Lily feels guilty about Hilary's accident and initially hesitates to attend the wedding.
    * Cane encourages Lily to be there for Devon and Hilary, reminding her that they don't blame her.
* Mariah's Difficult Decision:
    * Mariah decides to leave Genoa City with Tessa to help find Tessa's sister, Crystal.
    * Tessa advises Mariah not to tell anyone about their reason for leaving to protect Crystal's identity.
* Hilary's Health Deteriorates:
    * Hilary faints while talking to Mariah, causing concern among the wedding guests.
    * Nate informs Devon that Hilary's condition is more serious than initially thought.
* Hilary and Devon Exchange Vows:
    * Devon and Hilary share heartfelt vows, expressing their love and commitment to each other.
    * Hilary struggles to finish her vows due to her weakening state.
* Neil's Gift to Hilary:
    * Neil offers Hilary his friendship and support, putting their past differences aside.
    * Hilary is touched by Neil's gesture and accepts his friendship.
* Symbolic Wedding Gifts:
    * Hilary receives traditional wedding gifts from her friends, each holding special meaning.
    * Phyllis gives Hilary a heart-shaped rock, symbolizing that love is always present even in difficult times.
</summary>

<summary>
* John is rushed to the hospital after experiencing blurry vision and a headache.
    * He is diagnosed with a minor stroke but seems to be recovering well.
    * While Jack and Ashley are visiting, John experiences difficulty breathing and codes.
* John's family waits anxiously for news of his condition.
    * Gloria is particularly distraught and blames herself for John's stress.
    * Kevin arrives at the hospital to offer support to the family.
* Lily returns home to her parents after leaving Daniel.
    * She is frustrated by her parents' attempts to control her and feels like she can't trust anyone.
    * Dru and Neil's disagreement about how to handle Lily's situation escalates into a major fight.
* Daniel feels guilty about lying to Lily and believes their marriage is over.
    * Kevin tries to comfort Daniel and encourages him to move on.
    * Lily shows up at the coffeehouse and breaks down in front of Daniel.
* Dru and Neil's fight intensifies, with each blaming the other for Lily's current state.
    * Neil criticizes Dru for her past dishonesty and manipulative behavior.
    * Dru accuses Neil of being self-righteous and never admitting his own mistakes.
</summary>

<summary>
* This episode revolves around the aftermath of Victor Newman's supposed death and the power struggle at Newman Enterprises.
    *  Adam, Victor's son, takes over as Chairman of the Board and appoints Brad Carlton as CEO, much to Victoria's dismay.
    *  Nikki, still in denial about Victor's death, refuses to return home from Mexico.
* Jack's decision to publish an exposé article about Victor creates tension and conflict.
    *  Nick is furious with Jack for speaking ill of his father and accuses him of hacking into his computer.
    *  Jill threatens legal action against Jack for publishing damaging information about her and Jabot.
* The episode also explores the complicated relationships between the characters.
    *  Sharon is torn between her loyalty to Nick and her partnership with Jack.
    *  Cane and Chloe navigate the challenges of their new marriage and impending parenthood.
* Meanwhile, Paul travels to Mexico to search for Nikki, who is desperately clinging to the hope that Victor is still alive.
    *  Katherine expresses her concern for Nikki's well-being and her lack of trust in Jill's judgment.
    *  Victoria worries about her mother's state of mind and asks J.T. to keep an eye on Adam and Brad. 
</summary>

<summary>
* **Katherine's Request:**
    * Katherine leaves letters for her loved ones, asking them to write down their thoughts and feelings.
    * She instructs them to burn the letters, believing the smoke will deliver their words to her.
    * This ritual is inspired by a ceremony she participated in with Murphy.
    * Many find the request unusual but participate to honor her memory.

* **Personal Struggles:**
    * Nikki struggles with her sobriety, confiding her relapse in her letter to Katherine.
    * Devon grapples with his feelings for Hilary, who is now married to his father, Neil.
    * Neil, having lost his sight, tries to adjust to his new reality with Hilary and Devon's support.
    * Jill feels conflicted about Katherine's request, finding it difficult to express her emotions.

* **Finding Meaning:**
    * Victoria finds solace in spending time with Billy and their son, Johnny, after a difficult day.
    * Kevin reflects on Katherine's adventurous spirit, feeling inspired to pursue his own dreams.
    * Jack finds peace in knowing Katherine is watching over him and his family.
    * Lauren and Michael cherish their strengthened relationship, believing Katherine played a part in their reconciliation.

* **Jill's Revelation:**
    * Jill realizes the true treasure was the journey she embarked on, not the destination.
    * She understands Katherine orchestrated the music box mystery to bring her and Colin back together.
    * Overwhelmed with happiness, Jill decides to return the music box to Katherine's grave.
    * She thanks Katherine for her guidance and the newfound joy in her life.
</summary>

<summary>
* **Art Show Aftermath:**
    * Daniel is upset that Billy bought all the sketches of Amber.
    * Colleen tries to comfort Daniel, but he still has feelings for Amber.
    * Billy and Amber leave the bar together.

* **River's Daughter:**
    * River's daughter, Eden, shows up at Michael and Lauren's apartment.
    * Eden is angry at Michael for getting River arrested.
    * Michael promises to help River and agrees to let Eden stay with him and Lauren.

* **Jill's Good News:**
    * The SEC drops the investigation against Jill.
    * Jill wants to return to Chancellor Industries and work with Cane to keep Katherine in check.
    * Esther notices that Kay is forgetting things.

* **Cane and Chloe:**
    * Cane and Chloe go to the OB/GYN and see the baby's ultrasound.
    * Jill is excited about becoming a grandmother.
    * Cane rubs Chloe's aching hands.

* **Billy and Amber's Night Out:**
    * Billy and Amber go back to Billy's hotel room.
    * Billy asks Amber about Cane and Lily.
    * Daniel and Lily discuss their relationships.
</summary>

<summary>
* Jack resigns from the Abbott-Winters foundation, wanting to cut ties with Billy and Phyllis.
    * He feels Billy betrayed him by sleeping with Phyllis.
    * He believes Phyllis is to blame for her infidelity.
    * He no longer believes in the foundation's mission of second chances.
    * He wants to focus on Jabot.
* Billy blames Jack for the affair, saying he pushed Phyllis away.
    * He claims Jack was more interested in making peace with Victor than listening to Phyllis.
    * He says he was there for Phyllis when Jack wasn't.
    * He believes Jack is a hypocrite for judging him.
* Phyllis takes responsibility for her actions and begs Jack for forgiveness.
    * She admits she made a mistake and regrets hurting Jack.
    * She acknowledges she was drawn to Billy but ultimately chose Jack.
    * She asks Jack not to give up on their marriage.
* Nikki tries to mediate between the feuding parties.
    * She encourages Phyllis to fight for her marriage.
    * She advises Ashley to encourage Jack to forgive Phyllis.
    * She checks on Victoria to see how she's coping.
* Ashley is furious with both Jack and Billy.
    * She feels caught in the middle of their feud.
    * She believes Billy needs to take responsibility for his actions.
    * She is concerned about the impact the situation is having on Jabot.
* Neil tries to help both Jack and Billy.
    * He encourages Jack to not abandon the foundation.
    * He reminds Billy of his strength after Delia's death.
    * He urges Billy to start working the 12 steps again.
* Devon defends Hilary against Lily's accusations.
    * He believes Hilary has changed and is committed to their marriage.
    * He argues that people can learn from their mistakes and deserve second chances.
    * He is confident in the strength of his marriage with Hilary.
* Lily is skeptical of Hilary's motives.
    * She believes Hilary is only interested in social climbing.
    * She doesn't trust Hilary and thinks she will hurt Devon again.
    * She is concerned that Hilary will go after Jack now that he's available.
* Victoria decides to fully commit to her relationship with Travis.
    * She realizes she's been holding back because of her past with Billy.
    *

<summary>
* Damon is in critical condition at the hospital after being stabbed.
    * Doctors are working to save his life.
    * Phyllis and Daniel are at the hospital, worried about him.
    * Damon is visited by the ghost of his deceased son, Elias.
    * Elias convinces Damon to let go of his anger and hatred and choose to live.
* Ashley and Brad's marriage is over.
    * Ashley confessed her feelings for Victor to Brad.
    * Brad is angry and hurt, but trying to make the best of the situation for Abby's sake.
    * Ashley regrets her actions and wishes she could turn back time.
    * Brad is moving on with his life.
* Victor told Nikki about Ashley's feelings for him.
    * Nikki is upset and angry with both Victor and Ashley.
    * Victor claims he rejected Ashley and reassured Nikki of his love for her.
    * Nikki is still hurt and wants Ashley to face consequences for her actions.
* Michael is preparing for a fight with Kevin.
    * Kevin challenged Michael to a fight over Lauren.
    * Michael doesn't want to fight but feels he has no choice.
    * Lauren is worried about Kevin getting hurt.
* Nick wants to hire Sharon at Jabot, even though there's a hiring freeze.
    * He offered to pay her salary under the table.
    * Jack is hesitant but agrees to see what he can do.
    * Jack warns Nick that this could backfire if Sharon finds out.
* Lily is struggling to cope with the trauma of her encounter with Alex.
    * She is having nightmares and flashbacks.
    * She feels stupid and naive for falling for Alex's act.
    * Kevin is trying to help her move on.
* Kevin feels guilty about his past actions and wants to protect Lily.
    * He reassures her that Alex will never bother her again.
    * He apologizes for hurting her in the past.
    * He promises to protect her from now on.
* Dru visits the hospital after hearing about Damon's condition.
    * She is shocked and saddened by the news.
    * She reflects on Damon's peaceful nature and the tragedy of his situation.
</summary>

<summary>
* **Chance is honored for his bravery.**
    * Chance receives a commendation for service above and beyond the line of duty.
    * Chloe is jealous of Heather.
    * Jill is suspicious of Chloe's motives.
    * Chance is grateful for Chloe's support.
* **Billy and Mac break up.**
    * Billy slept with Kelly.
    * Mac is devastated and breaks up with Billy.
    * Billy is heartbroken and begs Mac to take him back.
    * Chloe finds Billy at Crimson Lights after the breakup.
* **Daniel's legal troubles continue.**
    * Daniel, Phyllis, and Amber discuss the possibility of Daniel fleeing the country.
    * Michael warns them against it.
    * Daniel tries to get information from Ryder.
    * Michael tries to get information from Heather.
* **Ryder is questioned about his connection to Deacon.**
    * Daniel, Kevin, and Jana question Ryder about his relationship with Deacon.
    * Daisy interrupts and accuses Ryder of sending a rat to Lauren.
    * Kevin defends Ryder.
    * Jana questions Ryder's loyalty to Kevin.
</summary>

<summary>
• Victoria suspects she might be pregnant, causing her to feel unwell.
    • Billy is excited but Victoria is less certain, having taken a pregnancy test with negative results.

• Kevin and Chloe take Delia to a Christmas tree lot for a festive photoshoot.
    • The photos are humorous and Chloe's wig falls off during the shoot, leading to a complaint to child protective services.

• Lily and Cane discuss Christmas plans with Jill.
    • They express concern over the grandparents' excessive gift-giving and decide to go Christmas tree shopping.

• Cane learns that Tucker is conducting a background check on Blake.
    • Blake assures Cane that he has fabricated references to allay Tucker's suspicions.

• Phyllis takes care of a pregnant Daisy while working on a controversial article about Adam.
    • Daniel expresses concern about Summer being around Daisy, but Phyllis insists Daisy needs care due to a high-risk pregnancy.

• Billy warns Phyllis about the potential backlash from her article targeting Adam and Sharon.
    • He expresses concern about how far Daisy might go to protect her child, given her troubled past.

• Daniel brings Summer to visit Phyllis, hoping to create a festive atmosphere.
    • Phyllis is upset, believing Summer shouldn't be around Daisy, leading to a conflict between Daniel and Phyllis.

• Kevin offers to raise Daisy's baby, causing conflict with Phyllis.
    • Phyllis questions Kevin's suitability as a parent, prompting him to bring up her past struggles with parenting.

• Cane and Lily enjoy a romantic moment while decorating their Christmas tree.
    • Cane expresses his desire for his family's health, happiness, and safety.
</summary>

<summary>
• **Devon and Hilary's Reconciliation:**
    • Devon agrees to give Hilary complete control of the GC Buzz and welcomes her back as host and executive producer. However, Lily reveals to Devon that Hilary's job offers were a manipulation tactic.
• **Jack and Billy's Ongoing Feud:**
    • Jack remains hostile towards Billy, refusing to allow him to stay for Christmas Eve dinner despite Ashley and Traci's pleas.
• **Phyllis's Job Prospects:**
    • Phyllis tells Jack she's ready to leave Jabot and later proposes to Lauren that she work for Fenmore's full-time, to which Lauren agrees.
• **Gloria's Return and Family Dynamics:**
    • Gloria returns from France and decides to stay with Michael and Lauren, much to their dismay. She clashes with Chloe over her relationship with Kevin and Bella.
• **Christmas Eve Festivities:**
    • The Abbotts, albeit strained, celebrate Christmas Eve together, while Michael and Lauren host a gathering with Chloe, Kevin, Bella, and Gloria.
</summary>

<summary>
• **Faith Runs Away:**
    • Upset over her parents' breakup and Nick calling off the wedding, Faith runs away from home, causing Sharon and Nick to worry. She is later found safe at the coffeehouse with Dylan.

• **Constance's Revelation:**
    • As Constance's health deteriorates, she reveals to Adam (who she believes is Gabriel) that his father didn't die of a heart attack but committed suicide after Victor Newman took over his company.

• **Victoria's Decision:**
    • Victoria decides to give her daughter the last name "Abbott-Newman," prioritizing her daughter's connection to the Newman family, which upsets Billy.

• **Joe Clark's Project:**
    • Joe Clark, Cane's former business acquaintance, arrives in Genoa City with a warehouse-redevelopment project, facing opposition from Jill and Colin's potential investment.

• **Ashley and Stitch's Awkwardness:**
    • Ashley and Stitch try to navigate their professional relationship after their one-night stand, with Abby noticing the tension between them.

• **Victor's Interest in Ashley's Work:**
    • Victor tasks Tobias with finding out what Ashley is developing in the lab, hoping to gain an advantage or steal her work.

• **Avery and Dylan's Setback:**
    • Avery and Dylan's efforts to save the warehouse district suffer a setback when their application for historical landmark status is denied.

• **Sharon and Nick's Custody Battle:**
    • Despite Faith's pleas for them to reconcile, Nick remains firm in his decision to pursue sole custody, leading to further tension with Sharon.

• **Stitch's Christmas Plans:**
    • Stitch plans to spend Christmas with Victoria and expresses his frustration over not being able to contact his son, Max, and Jenna.

• **Constance's Request:**
    • Before succumbing to her illness, Constance makes Adam promise to make Victor pay for his role in his father's death, fueling Adam's desire for revenge.
</summary>
